summary: This bill addresses the issue of "Misbehaving Content Scrapers," likely focusing on online data gathering practices. It instructs scrapers to respect robots.txt rules and warns that their IP addresses may be rate-limited. It suggests using the GPO.gov Bulk Data Download as an alternative to scraping. The bill appears to be aiming to regulate how data is accessed and used, possibly to protect a website's functionality or legal rights concerning content ownership.
